text: Alojz Lah (born 17 July 1958) is a Slovenian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Yugoslavia Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sežana
title: Alojz Lah
